B

Book - Class in model
The Book class represents a book in the library, with a title, author, available quantity, and total quantity.
Book(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Book
Creates a new Book object with the given title, author, available quantity, and total quantity.
borrowBook(Book) - Method in class model.Reader
Borrows a book from the library and adds it to the reader's list of borrowed books.

L

LibraryController - Class in controller
The LibraryController class is responsible for managing the library's catalog and readers.

This class represents a controller for the library system, responsible for managing the communication between the view and the model.
